Welcome.title: Welcome in Fitness application
Welcome.firstPoint: Learn and grow! This app is a product of our journey in the Software Systems Architecture course.
Welcome.secondPoint: Achieve your fitness goals with tailored exercises and health-focused features.
Welcome.thirdPoint: Share your progress with others, discuss sports, and stay motivated together!
Welcome.fourthPoint: Plan meals, explore recipes, and make healthy cooking simple and enjoyable.
